title: Software Engineer (m/f) - MED-EL Medical Electronics
subtitle: Innsbruck, T 6020
body:
MED-EL is a leading manufacturer of innovative medical devices for the treatment of various types and degrees of hearing loss. Our unique portfolio of implantable hearing solutions benefits thousands of individuals in more than 100 countries worldwide. With headquarters in Innsbruck, Austria, MED-EL has over 2200 employees around the world. In support of our continuing growth, we currently have an open position with focus on:
Apply online

Software Engineer (m/f)

DD_1_1902
Innsbruck, Austria

Main Tasks

  • Apply .NET (Dynamics) or Salesforce Apex code as well as Lightning for a World Wide Online Portal and Community Solution
  • Develop and integrate REST APIs and Integrate Interfaces to the Core System
  • Integrate Authentication mechanism with OAUTH and SAML2
  • Implement Frontend UI using HTML5/CSS/Javascript.
  • Work alongside with different stakeholders

Requirements

  • Strong background and know-how in Software Development for Business Applications
  • Practical experience in Web Technologies (Javascript/HTML/CSS)
  • First experience in SSO is preferred
  • Good communication skills in English, German is a plus
  • Team-oriented and motivated personality, accurate and independent approach



Salary will be determined based on professional experience; the formal minimum salary according to Collective Bargaining Agreement is EUR 37,022.44

We offer a challenging opportunity in a multinational work environment with English as our company language. We look forward to receiving your application at jobs.medel.com
